thought: To craft mossy_stone_bricks, I need to craft stone_bricks first. To craft stone_bricks, I need to place 4 stone side by side in the crafting table. The stone is at slot 39, therefore I will move the stone to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
